# Libraries
```{r}
library("ggplot2")
library("reshape2")
library("ggfortify")
library("tidyverse")
library("plotly")

source("functions.R")
```


```{r}
data <-read.csv("data/alrosa/revenue.csv", sep = ",")
  
# avoid sorting
data$Dt <- factor(data$Dt, levels = data$Dt)
  
df <- data
```

# Basic observation of the data Alrosa/Revenue

```{r, fig.width = 15}
p <- revenuePlot(df)
link <- revenuePlotInteractive(p)
link
```
